name: Flutter Mobile App PRD
description: Cross-platform Flutter application covering UI layers, state management, and native integrations.

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Flutter-based mobile experience targeting iOS and Android with a shared Dart codebase and native plugin access.

sections.title: Functional Requirements
sections.content: Onboarding flow, authenticated dashboard, offline caching, push notifications, analytics instrumentation.

sections.title: Non-Functional Requirements
sections.content: 60 fps animations on target devices, bundle size under 25MB, crash-free sessions > 99.5%, offline-first resilience.

sections.title: Technical Stack
sections.content: Flutter 3+, Dart 3+, Riverpod/Bloc state management, Firebase Cloud Messaging, native plugin bridges.

technology_profile.notes: Ideal for product teams targeting simultaneous iOS and Android releases with consistent UI.

api_guidance.name: Firebase Cloud Messaging
api_guidance.rationale: Delivers push notifications across iOS and Android with high reliability and Flutter SDK support.

api_guidance.name: Firebase Analytics
api_guidance.rationale: Tracks mobile engagement events with low overhead and prebuilt dashboards.
